1: <pb/><e>A jun tic sb'it eb' yin̈tl Coré tzc'anlb'ej junc mach tzjucb'tzan b'it</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, yel xo wal wach' a nab'en 'a quib'n̈ an̈ a chon̈b' on̈ tic, yuj cha, 'ix a'n meltzjoc qui tzaljc'ojlal an̈ yin̈tl on̈ Jacob tic jun 'ejm xo.</t>
2: <t>'Ix ac' niwnc'ojlal qui maysch'olnilal on̈, 'ix a'n lajwc smasnil qui mul on̈.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Yelc'ojlal 'ix ej 'och wan yowl a c'ojl 'a quib'n̈ on̈ yet' a c'a'lc'ojlal.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ach qui Diosal on̈, qui Colmal aji, colwjan̈ pax quet' jun 'ejm xo on̈.</t> <t>'Ij 'och wan yowl a c'ojl 'a quib'n̈ on̈.</t>
5: <t>¿Tom 'ayn̈j cot yowl a c'ojl 'a quib'n̈ 'a smasnil tiempo on̈?</t>
6: <t>¿Man̈x am tzac' jacx qui tzatzl on̈, sec wach' tzon̈ tzalj pax et' on̈?</t>
7: <t>Mamin Jehová, ch'ox wal a chamc'ojlal 'ayn̈ on̈, tzon̈ a coln pax 'eli.</t>
8: <pb/><t>'Oj in maclc wab' tas 'oj yal Jehová Dios, yujto 'oj yac' junc'ojlal 'a quib'n̈ec an̈ yic xo caji, sec man̈x 'oj qui b'oc junc tas yet' qui man̈ nab'enalec.</t>
9: <t>Caw wal b'ecn sc'ojl Dios scolwj 'a eb' tz'och 'emmquilal 'a 'a, sec 'oj checljoc cha'an̈, to 'ayc' 'a qui calc yet' spoder.</t>
10: <pb/><t>'Oj sch'ox Dios schamc'ojlal 'a scal eb' schon̈ab', ax yoch eb' yiclumal 'a 'a. A eb' 'anma tojl sb'eyb'al, 'oj scha eb' sjunc'ojlal Dios.</t>
11: <t>A eb' 'anma 'a sat lum tic, 'oj syiclc eb' 'a smasnil sc'ojol, ax Dios caw tojl snab'en, yet' stzaljc'ojlal ax yiln cot eb' 'a satcha'an̈.</t>
12: <t>A Jehová a 'oj 'a'noc cot n̈ab', ax ya'n lum qui lumec tic sb'a'al.</t>
13: <t>A stojlal qui Diosalec a b'ab'l yu'uj, a tztojlb'tzan sb'e 'aj tzb'eyi.</t>
